snippet: The trial of Bishop Robert W. Finn and the Diocese of Kansas City-St. Joseph on charges of failure to report suspected child abuse avoids a lengthy public trial that was set to start Sept. 24.
abstract: Trial of Bishop Robert W Finn and the Diocese of Kansas City-St Joseph on charges of failure to report suspected child abuse will be decided by a judge rather than a jury.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Bishop Robert W. Finn and the Diocese of Kansas City-St. Joseph on charges of failure to report suspected child abuse avoids a lengthy public trial that was set to start Sept. 24.

headline.main: Missouri: Bishop Will Face Judge, Not Jury
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Bishop Will Face Judge, Not Jury
